question.content:
Zakir Hussain, Ustad Allah Rakha, Pandit
Shankar Ghosh, Pandit Udhai Mazumdar,
Pandit Vijay Ghate.

Asad Ali Khan was known for
playing which of the following Indian
instruments?

Hari Prasad Chaurasia is a
notable exponent of which musical
instrument?

solution.content:
Flute. Hariprasad Chaurasia
awards: Padma Bhushan (1992), Padma
Vibhushan (2000), Gan Samradni Lata
mangeshkar Award (2021-22), Sangeet
Natak Academy Award (1983). Some
other flute players: Ronu Majumdar,
Rakesh Chaurasia, Pannalal Ghosh,
Nityanand Haldipur, Vivek Sonar.

question.content:
Prabhat Sarma, a recipient of
Sangeet Natak Akademi Award, was a
_ player from Assam.

solution.content:
Flute. Prabhat Sarma's
awards:- Sangeet Natak Akademi Award
(2003), Asom Shilpi Diwas Award by the
Assam government (2001). Flute is the
part of the woodwind family group.

question.content:
Famous musician Talvin Singh is
associated with playing the_

solution.content:
Tabla. Other tabla players:
Sol.470.(b) Rudra Veena. It is a stringed
instrument, which is made of teak wood,
metal, pumpkin, and Bamboo. He
received Padma Bhushan (2008) and
Sangeet Natak Akademi Award (1977).
Rudra Veena exponents: Madhuvanti
Pal, Bahauddin Dagar, Zia Mohiuddin
Dagar.

question.content:
Pandit Ram Narayan, a famous
instrumentalist, is known for playing
which of the following instruments?

solution.content:
Sarangi. A sarangi is a
bowed stringed instrument with a
skin-covered resonator. Pandit Ram
Narayan awards Padma Shri (1976),
Padma Bhushan (1991) and Padma
Vibhushan (2005). Other sarangi players-
Ustad Sultan Khan, Ustad Binda Khan,
Suhali Yusuf Khan.

question.content:
Hara Shankar Bhattacharya is a
maestro of

solution.content:
Sitar: It is a stringed
instrument of the lute family. Its other
Artists Pandit Ravi Shankar, Nikhil
Banerjee, Vilayat Khan.

question.content:
Neeruswamy Pillai and
Rajaratanam Pillai are exponents of
which musical instrument?

solution.content:
Nadaswaram. It is a double
reed wind instrument from South India.
Other Exponents - Sheik Chinna Moulana,
Karukurichi Arunachalam, Thiruvizha
Jayashankar, and Namagiripettai
Krishnan. Mridangam- Ramnad
Raghavan, TK Murthy, Dandamudi Ram
Mohan Rao, T Gopalakrishnan. Mandolin
- Uppalapu Srinivas, Kishore Desai.

question.content:
Pandit Bhajan Sopori, who died in
the year 2022, was a famous player of
which musical instruments?
